indices.description: The id of the accessor that contains the indices.
indices.gltf_detailedDescription: The id of the accessor that contains the indices.  When this is not defined, the primitives should be rendered without indices using `drawArrays()`.

material.description: The id of the material to apply to this primitive when rendering.

mode.description: The type of primitives to render.
mode.gltf_detailedDescription: The type of primitives to render.  Allowed values are 0 (POINTS), 1 (LINES), 2 (LINE_LOOP), 3 (LINE_STRIP), 4 (TRIANGLES), 5 (TRIANGLE_STRIP), and 6 (TRIANGLE_FAN).
